resources.string: Will clear all, Are you sure?
Credential name already Exists, please change it
Repo name already Exists, please change it
Err:Repo name has illegal chars or too long
\\ No newline at end of file
Err: Can\'t create file with this name
Unknown Err: plz try another name
Err: file name has illegal chars!
Commit selected and Index items then sync with Remote
Reverted ph_a3f241dc_1 and deleted ph_a3f241dc_2 files
Will revert \"Modified\" or \"Deleted\" and [REMOVE] \"New\" files, are you sure?(\"Conflict\" items will ignore)
Must resolved conflicts and select them before commit
Err when querying settings from db
Please set username and email before commit!
Set username and email for repo. \nLeave fields empty, if you want to use global settings.
You can leave msg empty, will auto generate one
Please choose a \"Remote\" and set a \"Branch\" as upstream for current branch
Please set upstream for current branch!
err: upstream invalid, plz try sync first
plz set Username and Email first
Will try restore repo files to before merge state, are you sure?
Will unlink all remotes with current credential, are you sure?
Item already linked with another credential, are you sure change it link to current credential?
Gen commit msg err! commit abort!
Warn: please commit your changes before checkout or merge, otherwise may cause [DATA LOSE]!
Error occurred when querying repo info!
Error when querying branch commit id!
Cant\'t set upstream for remote branch!
Merge failed: src and target same!
Delete remote branch require network connection
Delete upstream branch err! operation abort!
Delete remote branch err! operation abort!
Delete upstream failed! upstream is invalid!
Remote name is ambiguous, plz specify a remote name
Err: Doesn\'t support open file over limit
Will reload file, unsaved content will lost, are you sure?
Will close file, unsaved content will lost, are you sure?
Err:upstream is invalid, plz go branches page set it then try again!
Will fetch all remotes, are you sure?
Will remove selected items from git, are you sure?
Will delete selected items, are you sure?
Will delete Repo and all its files on disk!!
Below files/folders already exists, do you want to override them?
Err: dir is not a git repo!
Open file with edit mode err, maybe you can try view file.
Open file with view mode err!
Open file err! not supported type! may try change file extension to .txt, If you sure it\'s a text file.
err:target is a file but expect dir!
Require import files list is empty!
You can click HERE copy err msg to clipboard
Do you want to save before close file?
If you don\'t know some icons meaning, try long press for get hints.
I am sure I want to hard reset
note: If unshallow success, You can\'t back shallowed again!
Will Unstage selected items, are you sure?
Commit all Index items then sync
File is unmodified, no diff for shown
No upstream set for local branch
Will delete ph_a3f241dc_1 line(s), are you sure?
Get default export folder failed, plz choose one
If you edited the file with external app, you might want to reload it to show modified content
Err: Target is not a file
Will do operation for selected \'Conflict\' item(s), are you sure?
Download all branches or specify a list
warn: force checkout will overwrite uncommitted changes
plz set git username and email first
warn: will override if tag name already exists
Err: You must set \'username\' and \'email\' for Repo before create \'Annotate Tag\'
warn: if tag name already exists, will override
warn: Remote will force Override Local same name Tags, even non-fastfowardable
warn: Local will force Override Remote same name Tags, even non-fastfowardable
note: as default, Remote [will not override] Local same name Tags, except you checked \'force\'
note: as default, for lightweight Tags, Local [will override] Remote if fastforwardable
Will apply then delete item, are you sure?
Will apply item, are you sure?
Will delete item, are you sure?
note:leave commit hash empty to compare with \'local\' (worktree)
plz set email and username then try again
leave msg empty will use origin commit\'s msg
Will use your username and email overwrite original commit\'s author info
repo state is MERGE but no merge head found, plz use abort merge to clean state
repo state is REBASE but no rebase head found, plz use abort rebase to clean state
repo state is CHERRYPICK but no cherrypick head found, plz use abort cherrypick to clean state
will checkout selected files, are you sure?
will cherrypick changes of selected files, are you sure?
if local has uncommitted changes, will overwrite
cherrypick only work for diff to parents
no parent for find changes for cherrypick
Select a parent for find changes
will create patch of selected files, are you sure?
plz add a repo then try again
no parent for find changes for create patch
will overwrite if branch already exists
export path: ph_a3f241dc_1 \n\n you can go to Files page found this file
will go to ChangeList, then you can continue or abort your merge/rebase/cherrpick
will push local branch to remote, are you sure?
will force overwrite remote branch even it is ahead to local
failed resolve commit by user input
Upstream not set or not published
Trash Bin icon for delete item
Three dots icon for add storage path
Please Grant Permission before you add a Storage Path
Please go to System Settings allow Manage Storage
Please grant permission before import repo
The Path is a Repos Parent Dir
will scan repos under this folder
Three dots icon for choose folder
Will clone selected submodules, are you sure?
Will delete submodules files on disk, then re-clone them again
WARN: becareful! if your repo contains nested-loops, it will be infinite clone until your device no more storage space!!
WARN: becareful! please make sure your repo doesn\'t contains nested-loops!!
Will sync info from .gitmodules to selected configs
will delete submodule\'s info from \'.gitmodules\' and \'.git/config\' of parent repo
will delete submodule\'s files on disk, include it\'s workdir and .git folder
Will do init repo for selected submodules.
note: most time you need not init repo by yourself, it should did when you cloning repo.
Will try restore .git file for selected submodules.
note: most time you need not restore .git file by yourself, it should auto restore when need but lost.
Will import selected submodules to Repos, then you can manage them just like manage normal Repos.
err: invalid url, if you deleted submodule, maybe need go to ChangeList to commit changes
Will ignore selected files, are you sure?
Will init selected folders to git repos, are you sure?
Will match credential by domain, you can link domain and credential at \'Credential Manager\' page
Will reload selected submodules. \n\nnote: usually you need not do this, except you trust submodules infos are out-of-date on this list.
Selected credential will be linked to repo\'s Remotes, usually is \'origin\'
won\'t actually make changes, just test that the patch applies
Submodule has uncommited changes, you must make it clean before you stage/commit it at parent Repository.\n\nYou can manage submodule by import it to Repos.
Will try import selected dir(s) as repo(s)
Before saving file, create a snapshot for origin file first.
Before saving file, create a snapshot for editor\'s content first.
The storage paths are the paths you chosen and added when cloning a Repository.
This include editor opened files history and their last edited position
If you want to clone repo into external storage, this permission is required.
will accept ours, and delete lines: ph_a3f241dc_1, ph_a3f241dc_2-ph_a3f241dc_3
will accept theirs, and delete lines: ph_a3f241dc_1, ph_a3f241dc_2-ph_a3f241dc_3
will accept both, and delete lines: ph_a3f241dc_1, ph_a3f241dc_2, ph_a3f241dc_3
will reject both, and delete lines: ph_a3f241dc_1-ph_a3f241dc_2
Squash commits: ph_a3f241dc_1..ph_a3f241dc_2 (not include the Left commit)
If the Index contains uncommitted changes, will commit them as well
Warn: Index is Empty, will create a empty Commit
note: if the \'Line Number\' doesn\'t exist, will append content to the end of the file
A list icon lor filter commits by paths
Filter commits which included the paths, leave empty for show all
Plz import repo then try again
plz lode more then try again
will filter by file name, not by path
Can\'t compare clipboard to Context line
Can\'t compare both Context type lines
If enable, will allow unknown hosts as default, else will ask
After forgetting the host keys, when you connect to a host with ssh again, it may ask you to confirm again.
Trying to connect to an unknown host. Please review the fingerprints and only allow if you trust the host.
note: Your operation already aborted, after allowing the connection, you may want to retry
If unable to choose a path, may be your system removed the file picker. Just copy the path you wised and paste it instead.
Will clear the recent files list and forget their last edited positions

NOTE: I recommend every user go to Settings screen set a master password, it will used to encrypt your credentials, if you don\'t set it, password/passphrase of your credentials will encrypt by a public password, is not enough safe.
If clear your master password, you will not be able to access password/passphrase of your credentials before you encrypted with old master password, until you update them
leave new password empty and save if you don\'t want to use master password anymore
Update password/passphrase for below credentials failed, you should re-input password/passphrase for them, else these credentials will not be able to use:
old and new passwords are the same
Master password used to protect password/passphrase of your credentials. If set, will require input master password when launching app
Please make sure you can remember your master password!!!
Don\'t touch the password/passphrase if you don\'t want to update it
TimeZone offset in minutes when viewing commits
Leave empty to use default timezone offset from commits
e.g. -480 is UTC-8, +480 or 480 is UTC+8, +330 or 330 is UTC+5:30
You can leave the offset empty, then: when viewing GitObject(commits/tags/reflogs/etc), will read timezone from them; when creating GitObject, will save system timezone into them
When viewing GitObject, read timezone from it; when creating GitObject, save system timezone into it
encode new password failed, plz try another one
If empty, will reject all requests
Do you want to edit the file or import it?
For auto pull/push when enter/exit specified apps
Please find and enable/disable service for App
Will auto pull/push linked repos when selected apps enter/exit
Maybe you want to go to App Info to \'Allow Autostart\' and \'Disable Battery Optimization\'
Set upstream err, remote is invalid
Welcome! Please set git username and email! This is necessary for create commit!
Click to switch Selected/Unselected, Long-Click a selected App to config linked Repos
